FuncDef:
The traffic-statistics packet-type enable command enables packet-type-based traffic statistics collection for VPLS PWs.
The undo traffic-statistics packet-type enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, packet-type-based traffic statistics collection is disabled for VPLS PWs.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect packet-type-based statistics about VPLS PWs, run the traffic-statistics packet-type enable command. The packet type can be unicast, broadcast, or multicast.
Prerequisites
Traffic statistics collection has been enabled for VPLS PWs using the traffic-statistics enable command.
Precautions
The traffic-statistics enable command applies to a specific PW. The traffic-statistics packet-type enable command applies to all PWs in a VSI and applies to both the inbound and outbound directions of PWs.
